PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-12332011-10-20NRCAN,  ,  ,  , 
ActEnergy Efficiency Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Energy Efficiency Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the ENERGY EFFICIENCY REGULATIONS, in order to delay the implementation of the standards for general service lighting by two years so that implications for lighting choices for Canadians can be more effectively communicated to them. The amendments would also allow programs dealing with the disposal of compact fluorescent lamps to be more firmly established.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2011-0228 Publication Date: 2011-11-09
AttachmentsAttachment
